title: Enhance status bar with detailed token metrics
description: Enhance status bar to show detailed token metrics from AgentState.Metrics: input tokens, output tokens, cache read tokens, cache creation tokens. Format: 'Tokens: 1.2k in │ 450 out │ 12k cache'. Also show model name (e.g., 'opus' or 'sonnet').
closed_reason: Added formatTokens() and shortModelName() helper functions. Enhanced renderStatusBar() to display token metrics (input, output, cache) and model name when agentState is available. Format: 'Tokens: 1.2k in │ 450 out │ 12k cache │ Model: opus'. Cache tokens only shown when non-zero. Added tests for new helpers and status bar with agent state.
